item.title: Short-Form Video Editor for Meta & TikTok Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented short-form video editor to join our team and help create eye-catching video ads for Meta (formerly Facebook) and TikTok platforms. As a video editor, you will be responsible for crafting engaging and high-quality video content that aligns with our brand's vision and resonates with our target audience. Your primary focus will be on creating captivating ads that capture attention, inspire action, and drive user engagement.

Key skills required:
- Exceptional ability to create catchy hooks that grab viewers' attention instantly
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong storytelling and visual storytelling skills
- Ability to work with tight deadlines and deliver exceptional results
- Familiarity with Meta and TikTok ad specifications and best practices
- Understanding of social media trends and consumer behavior

If you have a passion for video editing, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to think creatively, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 00:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, English
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, English
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We run a YouTube channel in the psychology niche and we’re looking for someone who can edit videos for our channel. We’re looking to pay $25 for every project/video edit. The reason for low compensation is because the editing we ask for isn’t complex or requires much in terms of sound fx, transitions, or any effects really. If you have access to stock footage or know where to find good relevant clips, this may be a nice side gig for you.

We would provide you with the video script and a voice over and you would edit the video.

The length of the videos can range from 3-5 minutes long, no longer than 6 minutes. Due to the low compensation, we’re trying to end scripts and voiceovers at the 5 minute mark, but It can be slightly longer in terms of how much information we need to put in the script. Of course, compensation will increase for the same amount of work once the channel is producing more views. Right now, our goal is consistency, so we’re trying to put out videos as soon as possible, we’re also looking for a FAIRLY quick turnaround. (48 hours or less)

If you’re interested let us know and we’ll send you some samples of the types of videos we’re looking for and you can let us know if you can do it.

Also, if you’ve ever edited any YouTube videos, please attach samples of your work.

We look forward to hopefully working with you!


Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 20, 2024 00:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Urgent Descript Editor Needed TONIGHT - Upwork
item.description:
I need Six 20–40-minute Podcast videos edited.

This involves using descript underload to edit for clarity and then reviewing all edits made to make sure there are no hard edits, glitches, or sound problems.

You also must be extremely good at understanding English and professionalism because you need to make sure the videos are not offensive, rude, or odd and that they stay on topic.

You must also remove the backgrounds and switch them with the provided images, this is easily done in descript.

These videos are very easily done, but you must do them well. I cannot tolerate glitches or editing problems. You must do a good job the first time around.

I will pay extra if you do a super duper job. I will not pay if you don't do a good job at all

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 20, 2024 00:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Compositing, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Audio Editing, English, Proofreading
Skills: Compositing, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Audio Editing, English, Proofreading
Country: United States

item.title: TikTok content NYC based - Upwork
item.description:
Hi All! I work for a new startup called Glimpse Live. We just released a new app that allows people around the world to livestream one another on-demand at any time (and get compensated for it!). Check out our website here: https://justglimpseit.com

Asking for:
A TikTok reel that showcases the use case of Glimpse for remote tasks. For example, hiring a glimpse provider to not only livestream something for you, but also purchase an item and/or do errands for you as well.

We are ideally looking for a content creator that has family / friends in another country that would be willing to participate in your video.

Qualifications:
Experience editing and producing engaging TikTok videos based on fast-changing trends. High energy, passionate, self motivated, easy to work with, comfortable in front of a camera and able to articulate information about the products to drive sales.

Pay:
The current rate is $75/video.

If this sounds like you, please email over your name with phone number and email, and most importantly, your TikTok page and/or anything you have that would showcase your talents.

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 20, 2024 00:44 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Content Creation
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Nonprofit Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to assist with editing a nonprofit video and removing wind noise. The video will be used to showcase the organization's mission and impact. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and the ability to work with the latest editing software. Attention to detail is essential to ensure the final video is of high quality. The main task will be to remove wind noise from the audio track while maintaining the clarity of the dialogue. This gig requires someone who is reliable, deadline-oriented, and can communicate effectively.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Audio editing
- Attention to detail
- Communication

Budget: $100

item.title: Experienced Filmmaker and Videographer based in New York - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Filmmaker and Videographer based in New York to join our team. As a Filmmaker and Videographer, you will be responsible for capturing and editing high-quality videos for various projects. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their expertise in storytelling, cinematography, and video editing. You should be skilled in using professional video equipment, have a good eye for detail, and be able to work independently as well as collaborate with a team.

  Responsibilities:
  - Capture and edit high-quality videos for various projects
  - Collaborate with the creative team to develop engaging video content
  - Ensure video projects are completed on time and within budget
  - Stay updated with the latest video trends and techniques
  - Assist with pre-production planning and post-production tasks

  Skills required:
  - Proficient in using professional video equipment
  - Strong storytelling and cinematography skills
  - Excellent video editing skills using software such as Adobe Premiere Pro
  - Ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines

  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level Filmmaker and Videographer who can bring creativity and technical expertise to our team.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 00:28 UTC

item.title: YouTube Channel Manager and SEO Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

I am seeking a talented and motivated individual to assist me with managing and optimizing my YouTube channel. This role is perfect for someone with experience in YouTube content strategy, SEO, and audience engagement who can dedicate 2-3 hours per week.

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement content strategies based on YouTube and Instagram comments and posts for video inspiration.
Optimize video titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails for better visibility and engagement.
Create compelling and SEO-friendly thumbnails.
Manage YouTube channel branding, including banner, profile picture, and overall aesthetics.
Engage with the audience through comments and community posts.
Monitor and analyze channel performance using YouTube Analytics.
Provide reports on key metrics like views, watch time, and subscriber growth.
Ensure all content adheres to YouTube’s community guidelines and copyright policies.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a YouTube Channel Manager and/or SEO Specialist.
Strong understanding of YouTube and social media algorithms and best practices.
Proficient in SEO tools and techniques.
Excellent graphic design skills for thumbnail creation.
Ability to analyze data and generate actionable insights.
Strong communication skills and ability to engage with an audience.
Familiarity with video editing tools is a plus.
Work Hours:

Approximately 2-3 hours per week.
Flexible scheduling to accommodate your availability.
Application Requirements:

Please provide examples of YouTube channels you have managed or optimized.
Include examples of thumbnails you have created.
Briefly describe your approach to content strategy and SEO for YouTube.
Additional Information:

I already have a video editor on my team who assists with video editing and some thumbnails.
I aim to post new videos once a week, possibly twice a week, depending on the workflow and efficiency we establish.
If you are passionate about YouTube and social media, and you have the skills and experience to help grow a channel, I would love to hear from you!




Posted On: June 20, 2024 00:27 UTC
Category: SEO
Skills:SEO Keyword Research, YouTube Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, YouTube Development
Skills: SEO Keyword Research, YouTube Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, YouTube Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Monthly Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced video editor to create 4 high-quality 20-minute videos per month for a growing YouTube channel. The videos will be used for educational purposes and will need to be engaging and professional. The editor will be responsible for selecting and editing footage, adding transitions, sound effects, and music, as well as ensuring the overall flow and coherence of the videos.

Example of the video format we're looking for (voice-over on top of clips and music): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eJ-eNgflniA

  Skills required:
  - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of video storytelling techniques
  - Knowledge of audio and colour correction
  - Ability to work with tight deadlines and handle multiple projects simultaneously

If you are passionate about video editing and can deliver professional videos on a regular basis, we would love to hear from you!

Budget is $150 per month for 4 videos a week. Thanks!

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 19, 2024 23:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Commercial

  - Strong understanding of video storytelling techniques
  - Knowledge of audio and colour correction
  - Ability to work with tight deadlines and handle multiple projects simultaneously

If you are passionate about video editing and can deliver professional videos on a regular basis, we would love to hear from you!

Budget is $150 per month for 4 videos a week. Thanks!

Budget: $150

item.title: Experienced Short Editor (Alex Hormozi Style) - Upwork
item.description:
Salary ranges from $100 to $400 per month per client.

Location: anywhere/virtual

My name is Eduardo, and I am the Head of a social media content agency.

We are not a new company. We currently have full-time clients, but it's time to add another team member to help us provide exceptional service to our clients.

REQUIREMENTS

We are seeking for a Short Form Content editor that can:

-Create 5 high-quality short films per day.
-Experienced in Grant Cardone, Alex Hormozi, Ryan Pineda style and  QUALITY
-You will need premiere pro and aftereffects with the ability to make these shorts


You should have prior expertise with short form content, creating these forms of short-form content, and be certain that you will meet the requirements.


We have high standards for giving our clients the best results, so we will only consider applicants who have proof and experience doing this type of work.


To begin your interview process, submit a proposal and write requirements on top of your cover letter.

item.title: Video and Graphic Logo Creation for Band - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented graphic designer who can create a visually stunning video logo and graphic logo for our band. The video logo will be used as an intro for our YouTube channel and social media videos, while the graphic logo will be used for our website, album covers, and merchandise. The logo should reflect our band's unique style and genre, and should capture the attention of our target audience.

Skills required:
- Graphic design
- Video editing
- Logo design
- Branding

This is a medium-sized project that will take approximately a week to complete. We are looking for an intermediate-level designer who has experience in creating eye-catching logos and videos for musicians or bands. If you are passionate about music and have a creative flair, we would love to see your portfolio and discuss further details with you.

Budget: $150

Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Logo Design

item.title: Expert Video Ad Reviewer or Marketing Expert - Upwork
item.description:
Marketing expert

We are looking for an expert video ad reviewer to provide a thorough analysis of a video ad we produced for a school. Your feedback and recommendations will be crucial in improving the ad's effectiveness. Your tasks will include reviewing the ad's content, messaging, visuals, and overall impact. We need someone with a keen eye for detail, strong analytical skills, and a deep understanding of effective advertising techniques. You should be able to provide specific suggestions for enhancing the ad's storytelling, audience engagement, and call-to-action.

This is the video ad: https://youtu.be/RaLdHddTfQU

    Skills required:
    - Expertise in video advertising
    - Proficiency in analyzing and critiquing ad content
    - Knowledge of effective storytelling techniques
    - Understanding of audience psychology and engagement
    - Ability to provide actionable recommendations

    We are looking for an expert who can offer valuable insights to take our video ad to the next level. I expect you to review it and recommend improvements within 48h and spend about 20 min of your time on it, and charge 1 hour of your usual rate.

Hourly Range: $35.00-$80.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 23:27 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Commercial, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Slovenia

item.title: Video Color Correction Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Video Color Correction Specialist to help us enhance the overall look and feel of our footage. The footage was recorded over multiple shoots in different lighting scenarios, and we want to achieve a cohesive and visually appealing result. As a Color Correction Specialist, your responsibilities will include adjusting the colors, tones, and contrast of the footage to ensure consistency and create a professional finish by creating a custom LUT or Powergrade per clip of footage. The ideal candidate should have experience in color grading and be proficient in industry-standard software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or DaVinci Resolve.   

Relevant skills:
- Color grading
- Video editing
- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro or DaVinci Resolve
- Attention to detail
- Strong understanding of color theory


Posted On: June 19, 2024 23:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
